utterances.speaker: USR
utterances.text: where's the nearest parking garage

utterances.speaker: SYS
utterances.text: The nearest parking garage is Dish Parking at 550 Alester Ave. Would you like directions there?

utterances.speaker: USR
utterances.text: Yes, please set directions via a route that avoids all heavy traffic if possible.

utterances.speaker: SYS
utterances.text: It looks like there is a road block being reported on the route but I will still find the quickest route to 550 Alester Ave.

utterances.speaker: USR
utterances.text: Thanks so much for your help.

utterances.speaker: SYS
utterances.text: You're very welcome!

utterances.speaker: USR
utterances.text: Where is the nearest gas station?

utterances.speaker: SYS
utterances.text: There is a 76 4 miles away.

utterances.speaker: USR
utterances.text: What is the address?

utterances.speaker: SYS
utterances.text: The 76 gas station is located at 91 El Camino Real. It is 4 miles away through moderate traffic

utterances.speaker: USR
utterances.text: Thanks!

utterances.speaker: SYS
utterances.text: Anytime!

utterances.speaker: USR
utterances.text: show me the closest location where i can get chinese food

utterances.speaker: SYS
utterances.text: The closest chinese restaurant is PF Changs, located 5 miles away.

utterances.speaker: USR
utterances.text: OK, please give me an address and directions via a route that avoids all heavy traffic.

utterances.speaker: SYS
utterances.text: P.F. Changs route set to 669 El Camino Real with only moderate traffic noted.

utterances.speaker: USR
utterances.text: Thank you

utterances.speaker: SYS
utterances.text: You're welcome. Drive safely, and enjoy.

utterances.speaker: USR
utterances.text: Hi, please set up a reminder for my dinner on the 11th at 4pm with my sister. Thanks!

utterances.speaker: SYS
utterances.text: Set! Have a good time

utterances.speaker: USR
utterances.text: What time is dinner and who is it with?

utterances.speaker: SYS
utterances.text: Dinner is at 7 pm with Jon.

utterances.speaker: USR
utterances.text: Okay, perfect! Thanks.

utterances.speaker: SYS
utterances.text: you're welcome
